roleset.name: paint with whitewash
roleset.note: WHITEWASH-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.9. Comparison to ?paint?. Roleset by Julia. (from whitewash.01-v)

example.name: whitewash-v: All args
example.text: They whitewashed the walls with lime.

example.name: whitewash-v: transitive with instrument
example.text: The squirrel has whitewashed the walls with his tail.

roleset.name: exonerate, perhaps in a shady way,
roleset.note: WHITEWASH-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 10.6. Comparison to ?unburden?. Roleset by Julia. (from whitewash.02-v)

role.descr: Agent or organization doing the whitewashing

example.name: whitewash-v: Transitive
example.text: Attorney General Holder just whitewashed the authors of the torture memos.
example.arg: the authors of the torture memos.

example.name: whitewash-v: Passive with theme
example.text: [Assistant District Attorneys and favored law firms]-1 were also whitewashed *trace*-1 of crimes.
example.arg: *trace*-1: [Assistant District Attorneys and favored law firms]

example.name: whitewash-v: with predication
example.text: They whitewashed him as an advocate of toleration.

example.name: whitewash-n
example.text: It is also miles from the truth: a whitewash of history

roleset.name: cover up a misdemeanor, fault, or error
roleset.note: WHITEWASH-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. No Vncls. Comparison to ?cover up?. Roleset by Julia. (from whitewash.03-v)
WHITEWASH-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from whitewash.03-n)

example.name: whitewash-v: Transitive with instrument
example.text: He hasn't whitewashed the truth with the typical right wing rhetoric.
example.arg: with the typical right wing rhetoric.
